newsitem.title: USA: Flanders to buy Enviro Spin-Tech for $2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Flanders to buy Enviro Spin-Tech for $2 mln.

text.p: Flanders Corp said on Monday that it signed a letter of intent to buy the assets of Enviro Spin-Tech Inc.
Under the terms, Flanders will pay $2 million for equipment, patents, designs and other assets, as well as taking over the operation of the facility in Pennsylvania.
Flanders said it would use the new technology to produce a new form of bonded carbon filtration media and related products with lower production costs and higher performance.
